game_description: A CREATIVE SANDBOX TO CREATE Pocket Racer : Sandbox Edition give you the freedom to: - Create your own tracks from 100 prefab sections - Choose from 8 different vehicles, including monster trucks, indy cars and motorbikes - Race in first-person (grab the virtual wheel) or miniature (micromachine, Hot Wheel or RC Car scale) - Publish your own tracks online for others to race and compete for lap records - View replays of all other racers who have completed a race on your tracks. Imagine your wildest driving fantasy... build whatever you want with a large selection of track pieces, ramps, half pipes, portals, speed boosters, ice tracks and more! Experiment with your own creations using the 5 default save slots and when you are ready you can publish your track online. Invite other players and compete to be the king of your own creation! CuriousVR is a solo gamedev and this project is in active development. Feel free to reach out with feature request, comments and concerns.
